setAllCustomersToNotFinished() - Method in class cw3.Elevator
Iterates through customerList, setting each Customer's "finished" attribute to false (via the Customer's setFinished method).

setNumFloorsAndTopFloor(int) - Method in class cw3.Elevator

startElevatorDefaultStrategy() - Method in class cw3.Elevator
Starts this elevator at default strategy: Starts at the bottom floor. Goes to the top floor. Goes back down to the bottom floor. Picks up and drops off customers according to the data in Elevator.customerList, using the methods Elevator.pickUpCustomers() and Elevator.dropOffCustomers(), respectively. Once finished, this method returns the total amount of moves this elevator has done.
startElevatorImprovedStrategy() - Method in class cw3.Elevator
Starts the elevator at improved strategy: Starts at the CURRENT floor (This saves the elevator a trip to the bottom floor, if a second run was needed (and implemented). Only goes as high as necessary on the way up, and as low as necessary on the way down, using the methods: Elevator.unservedCustomersRemain() and Elevator.customersWaitingInDirection() to determine whether to keep moving / change direction / stop. Picks up and drops off customers according to the data in Elevator.customerList, using the methods Elevator.pickUpCustomers() and Elevator.dropOffCustomers(), respectively. Once finished, this method returns the total amount of moves this elevator has done.
